title: User Authentication and Registration
summary: Implement secure user registration and login functionality
description: Develop a robust system that allows users to register and authenticate securely. This includes creating registration forms, email/mobile verification, password hashing, login sessions, and integration with secure authentication libraries. The module should follow standard banking security protocols such as multi-factor authentication and account lockout policies to protect against unauthorized access.

title: User Dashboard and Account Overview
summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying user account details
description: Build a responsive dashboard for authenticated users where they can view their account balance, recent transactions, and key performance indicators. The dashboard should be intuitive, provide real-time information, and support multiple account types such as checking, savings, and loans. Data should be fetched securely through backend APIs.

title: Funds Transfer Module
summary: Enable users to perform inter and intra-bank fund transfers
description: Implement functionality allowing users to transfer funds between their own accounts or to external bank accounts. This includes beneficiary management, validation of account details, transaction limits, and OTP verification. The system should log all transactions and handle failed transfers with appropriate rollback mechanisms.

title: Bill Payments and Utility Services
summary: Integrate bill payment services for added customer convenience
description: Develop a feature that allows users to make payments for utilities such as electricity, water, internet, and credit card bills. The system should provide integration with third-party payment gateways, display recent bills, track payment history, and support scheduled payments with auto-debit options.

title: Customer Support and Chat Assistance
summary: Provide customer support capabilities within the app
description: Integrate an in-app customer support module featuring live chat, FAQs, and ticket submission. Users should be able to raise queries regarding transactions, account issues, or technical problems. Integration with support tools will ensure that queries are tracked, prioritized, and resolved efficiently.

title: AI-based Fraud Detection and Alerts
summary: Implement AI system for transaction monitoring and fraud prevention
description: Develop and deploy an AI engine that monitors transaction patterns in real-time to detect fraudulent or suspicious activities. Generate alerts for users and bank administrators when anomalies are identified. This module should leverage machine learning algorithms and integrate with existing transaction logs and customer behavior analytics tools.
